actions.text: Amendment SA 3286 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

Amendment SA 3286 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Klobuchar. (consideration: CR S7276; text: CR S7276) To include the Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs of the Senate in the committees to which the report on re-screening of baggage is required to be submitted.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3286 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Klobuchar.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3286 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

purpose: To include the Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs of the Senate in the committees to which the report on re-screening of baggage is required to be submitted.
